casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. MARK LEIGH (14561)

Foti, Lavery and Schaller, Js.

Argued December 5, 1995 decision released January 9, 1996 *905Robert G. Golger, for the appellant (defendant). Richard F. Jacobson, supervisory assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and Gerard Eisenman, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgments are affirmed.
